head.title: Document Editor SDK | On Premise APIs & Free App
head.description: Edit MS Office, OpenDocument, PDF images & other File Formats using Document Editor SDK or use the Online Document Editor App.

header.title: Edit and manage documents with ease
header.description_1: Document Editor SDK to manipulate Microsoft Office, OpenOffice, PDF, HTML, and other document file formats.
header.description_3: Easily manage form fields within documents.

actions.title: Ready to get started?
actions.description: Try GroupDocs.Editor features for free on your platform.

formats.title: 60+ file formats supported
formats.description: GroupDocs.Editor supports operations with a wide range of [document formats](https://docs.groupdocs.com/editor/net/supported-document-formats/).

code_samples.title: Practical code showcase
code_samples.description: Some use cases of typical GroupDocs.Editor operations.

sample_1.title: Editing a document
sample_1.content: GroupDocs.Editor allows you to edit various document formats and save the changes. You can edit whole documents or specific parts of your documents.

customers.title: Our happy customers
customers.description: GroupDocs libraries are employed by globally renowned and distinguished brands across the world.

faq.title: Frequently asked questions
faq.description: Answers to most commonly asked questions.

faq_1.question: Does the GroupDocs.Editor library need any other third-party software to manipulate documents?
faq_1.answer: GroupDocs.Editor does not require any external software to be installed such as Adobe Acrobat, Microsoft Office, or any other.

faq_2.question: Can I try the GroupDocs.Editor library before purchasing it?
faq_2.answer: Yes, you can try GroupDocs.Editor without buying a license. Once installed without a license, the library works in trial mode. In this mode, trial badges are added to the resultant document, and it is trimmed to the first 3 pages. If you wish to test GroupDocs.Editor without the limitations of the trial version, you can also request a 30-day temporary license. For more details, see [Get a Temporary License](https://purchase.groupdocs.com/temporary-license/).

faq_3.question: What licenses do you have?
faq_3.answer: We offer several license types to fit the needs of particular developers or companies. License types depend on the number of developers, the number of developer site locations, and whether you need to deliver our SDK/API to your end customers. Alternatively, you can choose Metered licenses based on monthly usage of the product. Learn more at [License Types](https://purchase.groupdocs.com/policies/license-types/).

features.title: GroupDocs.Editor at a glance
features.description: API to edit, translate, and save various document formats seamlessly.

feature_1.title: Edit multiple file formats
feature_1.content: Seamlessly edit multiple PDF, Office, and many other supported formats.

feature_2.title: Translate to HTML/CSS
feature_2.content: Translate documents to HTML/CSS markup compatible with WYSIWYG editors.

feature_3.title: Save edited documents
feature_3.content: Save edited HTML/CSS to source document format or export to PDF.

feature_4.title: Document information extraction
feature_4.content: Extract information such as page count, size, and encryption status.

cloud_links.title: GroupDocs.Editor low code APIs
cloud_links.description: Accelerate document editing in any type of application with our cloud-based REST API.

link_1.title: GroupDocs.Editor Cloud for cURL
link_1.content: Simple cURL commands for RESTful document editor Cloud API to edit and translate documents.

link_2.title: GroupDocs.Editor Cloud for .NET
link_2.content: Cloud SDK for Microsoft .NET to implement quick document editing features in .NET based applications.

link_3.title: GroupDocs.Editor Cloud for Java
link_3.content: Edit and translate documents in your Java applications using our Cloud API.

app_links.title: GroupDocs.Editor NoCode apps
app_links.description: Online application allowing you to edit 170+ popular file formats in browser.

link_1.title: GroupDocs.Editor Total
link_1.content: Try our free online app to edit more than 30 types of files without leaving your favorite web browser.

link_3.title: GroupDocs.Editor PDF
link_3.content: Edit PDF files directly from the web browser.

metrics.title: In-depth metrics and statistical insights
metrics.description: Dive into a detailed breakdown of our key figures, providing comprehensive metrics and statistical insights into our achievements, impact, and growth.

metric_1.title: Supported formats
metric_1.content: Each library supports editing more than 60 of the most popular file and document formats.

metric_2.title: NuGet downloads
metric_2.content: GroupDocs.Editor for .NET has more than 274K downloads from the NuGet package manager.

metric_3.title: Maven downloads
metric_3.content: GroupDocs.Editor for Java has more than 5.5K downloads from our Maven repository.

metric_4.title: Happy customers
metric_4.content: Our libraries are used by both small individual developers as well as by leading companies all over the world.
